mapper.select: SELECT i.id , i.name , i.condition , c.name_all , i.brand , i.price , i.shipping , i.description FROM items AS i JOIN category AS c ON i.category = c.id ORDER BY i.id LIMIT #{perPage} OFFSET #{perPage} * (#{currentPage} - 1)
SELECT i.id , i.name , i.condition , c.name_all , i.brand , i.price , i.shipping , i.description FROM items AS i JOIN category AS c ON i.category = c.id WHERE i.id = #{id}

SELECT i.id , i.name , i.condition , c.name_all , i.brand , i.price , i.shipping , i.description FROM items AS i JOIN category AS c ON i.category = c.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND c.name_all LIKE #{itemSearch.parentCategory} || '%'
AND c.name_all LIKE #{itemSearch.parentCategory} || '/' || #{itemSearch.childCategory} || '/' || '%'
AND c.name_all = #{itemSearch.parentCategory} || '/' || #{itemSearch.childCategory} || '/' || #{itemSearch.grandChild}
AND 1 = 1
AND name LIKE '%' || #{itemSearch.name} || '%'
AND brand LIKE '%' || #{itemSearch.brand} || '%'
ORDER BY i.id LIMIT #{pagenation.perPage} OFFSET #{pagenation.perPage} * (#{pagenation.currentPage} - 1)
